names.explanation: Allah's mercy encompasses all of creation, extending to believers and non-believers alike. His mercy is infinite and all-encompassing.
Allah shows special compassion to the believers. His mercy is specifically directed towards those who follow His guidance and seek His forgiveness.
Allah is the absolute sovereign ruler of all creation. His kingdom is eternal, and His authority is supreme over all things.
Allah is pure and perfect, free from all imperfections and defects. He is absolutely sacred and completely holy.
Allah is the source of all peace and safety. He is free from all defects and grants peace to His creation.
Allah grants security and watches over the believers. He protects those who have faith and keeps them safe from harm.
Allah is the overseer and protector of all creation. He witnesses all things and guards over His creation with perfect care.
Allah is invincible and all-powerful. Nothing can overcome His will, and He is victorious in all matters.
Allah's will cannot be resisted. He has absolute power to enforce His will and nothing can oppose Him.
Allah is supremely great and majestic. His greatness is beyond comparison and He is exalted above all creation.
Allah creates all things from nothing. He is the originator of all that exists and brings everything into being.
Allah fashions and shapes His creation perfectly. He brings things into existence according to His perfect plan.
Allah gives everything its unique form and shape. He designs and forms all creation with perfect wisdom.
Allah forgives sins repeatedly and abundantly. His forgiveness is limitless for those who sincerely repent.
Allah has complete dominance over all things. Nothing in creation can resist His power or escape His will.
Allah gives endlessly without expectation of return. His gifts are abundant and He bestows blessings upon all creation.
Allah provides sustenance to all living creatures. He is the source of all provision and nourishment.
Allah opens the way to success and victory. He grants solutions to problems and opens hearts to guidance.
Allah has complete and perfect knowledge of all things, past, present, and future. Nothing is hidden from Him.
Allah withholds provision and blessings according to His wisdom. He restrains with purpose and perfect knowledge.
Allah expands and increases provision for whom He wills. He grants abundance and opens opportunities.
Allah humbles the arrogant and lowers the status of the oppressors. He brings down those who transgress.
Allah raises the righteous in rank and status. He elevates those who are humble and obedient.
Allah grants honor and dignity to whom He wills. He gives strength and glory to His servants.
Allah disgraces those who deserve it through His perfect justice. He removes honor from the undeserving.
Allah hears all sounds and voices, no matter how faint. He listens to all prayers and responds.
Allah sees all things, both visible and hidden. Nothing escapes His sight, however small or concealed.
Allah is the ultimate judge between right and wrong. His judgments are always perfect and just.
Allah is absolutely just and fair in all His dealings. He never wrongs anyone and His justice is perfect.
Allah is kind and gentle with His servants. He works in subtle ways and shows kindness in unexpected moments.
Allah is aware of all hidden matters and inner thoughts. He knows the secrets of hearts and the reality of all things.
Allah is patient and does not hasten to punish. He gives time for repentance and shows restraint.
Allah is infinitely great and majestic. His greatness is beyond human comprehension and imagination.
Allah repeatedly forgives those who turn to Him in repentance. His forgiveness covers all sins for the sincere.
Allah appreciates and rewards even the smallest good deeds. He multiplies rewards and acknowledges efforts.
Allah is exalted above all creation. His status is supreme and nothing is comparable to Him in highness.
Allah is greater than everything in existence. His greatness has no limits or bounds.
Allah protects and preserves all of creation. He guards everything with perfect care and attention.
Allah sustains all creation and provides their needs. He has power over all sustenance and nourishment.
Allah takes account of all deeds. He is sufficient as a reckoner and His accounting is perfect.
Allah is full of majesty and splendor. His magnificence and grandeur are beyond description.
Allah is extremely generous and gives abundantly. His generosity knows no bounds and He gives without measure.
Allah watches over all creation constantly. Nothing happens without His knowledge and observation.
Allah responds to the prayers and calls of those who call upon Him. He answers supplications in His perfect wisdom.
Allah's mercy, knowledge, and power encompass everything. His vastness has no limits.
Allah is infinitely wise in all His decisions and actions. Everything He does has perfect purpose and wisdom.
Allah loves His righteous servants and they love Him. His love is perfect and bestows tranquility.
Allah is full of glory and honor. His glory is supreme and His honor is perfect.
Allah will resurrect all people on the Day of Judgment. He brings the dead back to life for accountability.
Allah witnesses all things and is present everywhere. Nothing is hidden from His witness.
Allah is the ultimate truth and reality. Everything else is temporary, but He is the eternal truth.
Allah is the ultimate trustee and guardian. Those who rely on Him will find Him sufficient.
Allah possesses perfect strength and power. His strength never weakens or diminishes.
Allah is firm and steadfast in His power. His strength is unshakeable and constant.
Allah is the guardian and protector of the believers. He supports and aids those who follow Him.
Allah is worthy of all praise. Every attribute of His is perfect and deserving of praise.
Allah keeps count of everything. He has enumerated all things and nothing escapes His reckoning.
Allah originates creation without precedent. He begins all things and creates from nothing.
Allah will restore and recreate all things. He brings back to life what has died.
Allah gives life to all living things. He is the source of all life and vitality.
Allah takes life when He wills. Death comes only by His command and at His appointed time.
Allah is eternally alive and never dies. His life has no beginning and no end.
Allah sustains Himself and all creation. He needs nothing and everything depends on Him.
Allah finds and knows all things. Nothing is lost or hidden from Him.
Allah is noble and illustrious. His nobility is perfect and His honor is absolute.
Allah is absolutely one and unique. There is nothing like Him in any way.
Allah is the eternal refuge whom all creation depends upon. He needs nothing while everything needs Him.
Allah has power over all things. He is capable of doing whatever He wills.
Allah has complete and absolute power. His ability is perfect and without limitation.
Allah brings forward what He wills. He advances things according to His wisdom.
Allah delays what He wills. He postpones things according to His perfect timing and wisdom.
Allah is the First with no beginning. He existed before all creation and time.
Allah is the Last with no end. He will remain after all creation has perished.
Allah is evident through His signs and creation. His existence is manifest in all things.
Allah is hidden from our senses and sight. His essence cannot be comprehended by creation.
Allah governs all affairs of creation. He alone has true authority and control.
Allah is exalted far above all creation. His status is beyond all comparison and imagination.
Allah is the source of all goodness and kindness. His benevolence encompasses all creation.
Allah accepts repentance repeatedly. He turns to those who turn to Him in sincere repentance.
Allah takes just vengeance on the oppressors. He punishes those who persist in wrongdoing.
Allah pardons and erases sins. He forgives completely and removes the consequences of wrongdoing.
Allah is extremely kind and compassionate. His kindness is gentle and His mercy is tender.
Allah owns and controls all kingdoms and sovereignty. All power and authority belong to Him alone.
Allah possesses perfect majesty and generosity. He deserves utmost reverence and gives abundant blessings.
Allah is perfectly fair and just. He establishes justice and equity in all matters.
Allah will gather all people on the Day of Judgment. He brings together what is scattered.
Allah is completely independent and needs nothing. All creation depends on Him while He depends on none.
Allah enriches whom He wills. He grants wealth and sufficiency to His servants.
Allah prevents harm from reaching His servants. He withholds according to His wisdom.
Allah can cause distress and hardship when decreed. All harm comes only by His permission.
Allah brings benefit to whom He wills. All good and advantage comes from Him.
Allah is the light of the heavens and earth. He guides and illuminates hearts and minds.
Allah guides to the right path. He shows the way to truth and righteousness.
Allah creates in unprecedented ways. His creation is unique and without comparison.
Allah is eternal and everlasting. He remains forever while everything else perishes.
Allah will inherit all that exists. Everything returns to Him after creation perishes.

names.meaning_en: The Guide to the Right Path
names.explanation: Allah guides with perfect wisdom. His guidance is always right and leads to righteousness.
Allah is supremely patient. He does not hasten to punish and gives time for correction.
Allah is the absolute One, indivisible and unique. He is one in His essence, attributes, and actions.
